name: Marigold Valley - Glitch Mode
description:
THIS IS JUST A DRAFT AND A WORK IN PROGRESS :)

Marigold Valley is the perfect city: augmented reality is the norm there, everyone lives in peace with one another and everything seems to work just fine.

Until...

Until everything is just... not. Gita's life turns upside down as the world in front of her eyes changes bit by bit, she has nowhere to go and nobody but her seems to notice that something's wrong.

Except for Ruan. He is just as confused as she is.

This story was written by: Aro & Eli
